#Text=Local municipalities in Italy ask taxes from religious schools
#Text=Sunday , August 2 , 2015
#Text=In the past few days in Italy , several municipalities have started asking religious schools to pay taxes for property and local services , despite the resistance of the Catholic Church .
#Text=Instituto Gonzaga , a catholic school in Milan . Image : Friedrichstrasse .

#Text=The request of the municipalities results from the sentence of the Italian Supreme Court of Cassation on July 8 , recognising as legitimate the request of the Municipality of Livorno asking religious schools to pay property taxes .
#Text=Requests have come from the Municipality of Bogliasco , next to Genova , and from the deputies of Movimento 5 Stelle ( M5S ) of the regional counsel of Lombardy .
#Text=The first case is of the mayor Luca Pastorino that in last years received several refusals of his requests for payment because of the religious nursery school and retirement home .
#Text=In the second case , the M5S party asks to the regional government to assure the local administrations of the region regularly apply the sentence of the Supreme Court .
#Text=The case on which the Court has ruled was of the religious schools Santo Spirito and Immacolata in Livorno , Tuscany , to pay over 422,000 euros in arrears for the period from 2004 to 2009 .
#Text=The request was advanced by the Municipality of Livorno in 2010 .
#Text=The city reasoned , " because the users of the private schools pay a frequency fee , this kind of activity is considered as a commercial one " ( ( it ) ) .
#Text=In 2014 the Italian municipal tax discipline has changed from the ICI system to the IMU system by the Monti government .
#Text=A mean cost per student criterion is used to tax only the schools that receive a fee higher than the mean cost per student fixed by the State .
#Text=The new law is not retroactive , so the taxes requested in arrears from 2006 to 2009 are under the ICI system .
#Text=Minister of Education Stefania Giannini said a " more general reflection " ( ( it ) ) is needed .
#Text=Claudio De Vincenti , undersecretary to the prime minister , said " a discussion table will be opened with the non-profit associations , religious association included " ( ( it ) ) .

#Text=Undersecretary for Education Mr. Toccafondi says " many schools will increase their fees or they will quit . Then the State will have to find new resources to build new structures and manage them " ( ( it ) ) .
#Text=Also the president of the Lombardy region , Roberto Maroni , has reacted by proposing some regional counter-measures to finance private schools .
#Text=The secretary general of CEI ( Italian Episcopal Conference ) , Nunzio Galantino , has called the sentence " dangerous " ( ( it ) ) and " ideological " ( ( it ) ) :
#Text=" We face a dangerous sentence .
